sections.general:
TECHNICAL IT HEALTHCARE CONSULTANT
Professional Summary
Experience Technical Consultant building enterprise-class IT systems for a range of industries such as: financial businesses, health-care industry,
telecommunication, distribution, manufacturing, transportation and pharmaceutical.
